SELECT MOVIE_NUM,
title
titleEng as title
, rating, `rank`, posterUrl FROM MOVIE ORDER BY ${ORDER}

SELECT
TH_REGION , COUNT(DISTINCT TH_NAME) AS COUNT
TH_REGIONEng as TH_REGION , COUNT(DISTINCT TH_NAMEEng) AS COUNT
FROM THEATER T LEFT JOIN CINEMA C ON T.TH_NUM = C.TH_NUM LEFT JOIN MOVIE M ON C.MOVIE_NUM = M.MOVIE_NUM WHERE 1=1
AND M.title = '${selectMovieTitle}'
GROUP BY TH_REGION
GROUP BY TH_REGIONEng

SELECT
DISTINCT(TH_NAME)
DISTINCT(TH_NAMEEng) AS TH_NAME
FROM THEATER T LEFT JOIN CINEMA C ON T.TH_NUM = C.TH_NUM LEFT JOIN MOVIE M ON C.MOVIE_NUM = M.MOVIE_NUM WHERE 1=1 AND TH_REGION = '${region}'

SELECT CI_NUMBER ,DATE_FORMAT(SC_TIME, '%H:%i') AS SC_TIME FROM THEATER T LEFT JOIN CINEMA C ON T.TH_NUM = C.TH_NUM LEFT JOIN MOVIE M ON C.MOVIE_NUM = M.MOVIE_NUM LEFT JOIN SCREEN S ON S.CI_NUM = C.CI_NUM WHERE 1=1 AND M.title = #{selectMovieTitle} AND T.TH_REGION = #{region} AND T.TH_NAME = #{selectTheaterName} AND DATE(S.SC_TIME) = #{fullDate} order by SC_TIME
SELECT DISTINCT CI_NUMBER FROM CINEMA WHERE TH_NUM = (SELECT TH_NUM FROM THEATER WHERE TH_REGION = #{region} AND TH_NAME = #{th_name})
